text: granthadavaralli heccinavaru, nivu visvasigalada balika nim'mannu matte dhikkaradedege maralisabayasiddaru. Satyavu avarige spastavada balikavu avaru tam'molagina asuyeyindagi (hige maduttiddare). Nivu matra, i kuritu allahanu tanna adesavannu prakatisuva tanakavu (avarannu) ksamisuttalu (avara tappannu) kadeganisuttalu iri. Allahanu khandita ellavannu madaballavanagiddane
